introCampra:
Welcome! Campra is a microblogging service.
Create "posts" to share your thoughts with everyone. 
With "reactions", you can also quickly express your feelings about everyone's posts. 
Post it out on Campra!
noAccountDescription: This user has not written their bio yet.
oauth2RedirectRequired: At least one redirect URI is required for OAuth2 applications
oauthAppCreatedDescription: Your OAuth2 application has been created successfully. Please save this information, especially the Client Secret, as it won't be fully displayed again.
exchangeCodeForToken: Exchange the code for a token
deleteAndEditConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this post and edit it? You will lose all reactions, echos and replies to it.
driveFileDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the file "{name}"? Posts with this file attached will also be deleted.
unfollowConfirm: Are you sure that you want to unfollow {name}?
exportRequested: You've requested an export. This may take a while. It will be added to your Drive once completed.
importRequested: You've requested an import. This may take a while.
schoolNotRegisteredDescription: Your school is not registered with Campra. Contact your school administration about Campra access.
schoolSubscriptionRequiredDescription: Your school needs an active Campra subscription for student access. Contact your school administration to complete Campra setup.
invalidEmailDescription: Please enter a valid email address.
emailCannotBeChanged: Email addresses cannot be changed for security purposes. Your email is linked to your school.
pageLoadError: An error occurred loading the page.
pageLoadErrorDescription: This is normally caused by network errors or the browser's cache. Try clearing the cache and then try again after waiting a little while.
serverIsDead: This server is not responding. Please wait for a while and try again.
youShouldUpgradeClient: To view this page, please refresh to update your client.
enterListName: Enter a name for the list
reactionSetting: Reactions to show in the reaction picker
reactionSettingDescription2: Drag to reorder, click to delete, press "+" to add.
blockConfirm: Are you sure that you want to block this account?
unblockConfirm: Are you sure that you want to unblock this account?
suspendConfirm: Are you sure that you want to suspend this account?
unsuspendConfirm: Are you sure that you want to unsuspend this account?
cacheRemoteFilesDescription: When this setting is disabled, remote files are loaded directly from the remote instance. Disabling this will decrease storage usage, but increase traffic, as thumbnails will not be generated.
flagAsBot: Mark this account as a bot
flagAsBotDescription: Enable this option if this account is controlled by a program. If enabled, it will act as a flag for other developers to prevent endless interaction chains with other bots and adjust Campra's internal systems to treat this account as a bot.
flagAsCatDescription: You'll get cat ears and speak like a cat!
flagShowTimelineRepliesDescription: Shows replies of users to posts of other users in the timeline if turned on.
autoAcceptFollowed: Automatically approve follow requests from users you're following
followConfirm: Are you sure that you want to follow {name}?
proxyAccountDescription: A proxy account is an account that acts as a remote follower for users under certain conditions. For example, when a user adds a remote user to the list, the remote user's activity will not be delivered to the instance if no local user is following that user, so the proxy account will follow instead.
clearQueueConfirmTitle: Are you sure that you want to clear the queue?
clearQueueConfirmText: Any undelivered posts remaining in the queue will not be federated. Usually this operation is not needed.
clearCachedFilesConfirm: Are you sure that you want to delete all cached remote files?
blockedInstancesDescription: List the hostnames of the instances that you want to block. Listed instances will no longer be able to communicate with this instance.
noteDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this post?
pinLimitExceeded: You cannot pin any more posts
youreBlocked: You have been blocked and are unable to view this user's posts
removeAreYouSure: Are you sure that you want to remove "{x}"?
deleteAreYouSure: Are you sure that you want to delete "{x}"?
resetAllDecos: Are you sure you want to remove all decorations?
keepOriginalUploadingDescription: Saves the originally uploaded image as-is. If turned off, a version to display on the web will be generated on upload.
uploadFromUrlDescription: URL of the file you want to upload
uploadFromUrlMayTakeTime: It may take some time until the upload is complete.
remoteUserCaution: As this user is from a remote instance, the shown information may be incomplete.
themeForLightMode: Theme to use in Light Mode
themeForDarkMode: Theme to use in Dark Mode
syncDeviceDarkMode: Sync Dark Mode with your device settings
circularReferenceFolder: The destination folder is a subfolder of the folder you wish to move.
hasChildFilesOrFolders: Since this folder is not empty, it can not be deleted.
whenServerDisconnected: When losing connection to the server
disconnectedFromServer: Connection to server has been lost
reloadConfirm: Would you like to refresh the timeline?
disablingTimelinesInfo: Adminstrators and Moderators will always have access to all timelines, even if they are not enabled.
pinnedUsersDescription: List usernames separated by line breaks to be pinned in the "Explore" tab.
pinnedPagesDescription: Enter the paths of the Pages you want to pin to the top page of Campra, separated by line breaks.
pinnedClipId: ID of the clip to pin
avoidMultiCaptchaConfirm: Using multiple Captcha systems may cause interference between them. Would you like to disable the other Captcha systems currently active? If you would like them to stay enabled, press cancel.
name: Name
antennaKeywordsDescription: Separate with spaces for an AND condition or with line breaks for an OR condition.
silenceConfirm: Are you sure that you want to silence this user?
unsilenceConfirm: Are you sure that you want to undo the silencing of this user?
notFoundDescription: No page corresponding to this URL could be found.
title: Title
onlyOneFileCanBeAttached: You can only attach one file to a message
signinRequired: Please register or sign in before continuing
usernameInvalidFormat: You can use upper- and lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores.
signinFailed: Unable to sign in. The entered username or password is incorrect.
groupInvited: You've been invited to a group
joinOrCreateGroup: Get invited to a group or create your own.
noFollowRequests: You don't have any pending follow requests
objectStorageBaseUrlDesc:
The URL used as reference. Specify the URL of your CDN or Proxy if you are using either.
For S3 use 'https://<bucket>.s3.amazonaws.com' and for GCS or equivalent services use 'https://storage.googleapis.com/<bucket>', etc.
objectStorageBucketDesc: Please specify the bucket name used at your provider.
objectStoragePrefixDesc: Files will be stored under directories with this prefix.
objectStorageEndpointDesc: Leave this empty if you are using AWS S3, otherwise specify the endpoint as '<host>' or '<host>:<port>', depending on the service you are using.
objectStorageRegionDesc: Specify a region like 'xx-east-1'. If your service does not distinguish between regions, leave this blank or enter 'us-east-1'.
objectStorageUseSSLDesc: Turn this off if you are not going to use HTTPS for API connections
objectStorageUseProxyDesc: Turn this off if you are not going to use a Proxy for API connections
showFixedPostForm: Display the posting form at the top of the timeline
unableToProcess: The operation could not be completed
deleteAllFilesConfirm: Are you sure that you want to delete all files?
removeAllFollowingDescription: Executing this unfollows all accounts from {host}. Please run this if the instance e.g. no longer exists.
userSilenced: This user is being suppressed due to an account flag.
yourAccountSuspendedDescription: This account has been suspended due to breaking Campra's terms of services or similar. Contact support@banditco.dev for support. Please do not create a new account.
serviceworkerInfo: Must be enabled for push notifications.
author: Author
leaveConfirm: There are unsaved changes. Do you want to discard them?
pluginTokenRequestedDescription: This plugin will be able to use the permissions set here.
useStarForReactionFallback: Use â˜… as fallback if the reaction emoji is unknown
emailConfigInfo: Used to confirm your email during sign-up or if you forget your password
emptyToDisableSmtpAuth: Leave username and password empty to disable SMTP verification
smtpSecure: Use implicit SSL/TLS for SMTP connections
smtpSecureInfo: Turn this off when using STARTTLS
regexpErrorDescription: An error occurred in the regular expression on line {line} of your {tab} word mutes:
notificationSettingDesc: Select the types of notification to display.
useGlobalSettingDesc: If turned on, your account's notification settings will be used. If turned off, individual configurations can be made.
regenerateLoginTokenDescription: Regenerates the token used internally during login. Normally this action is not necessary. If regenerated, all devices will be logged out.
fillAbuseReportDescription: Please fill in details regarding this report. If it is about a specific post, please include its URL and ID (The ending of the post url ex: notes/9358xkvosa).
abuseReported: Your report has been sent. Thank you very much.
forwardReportIsAnonymous: Instead of your account, an anonymous system account will be displayed as reporter at the remote instance.
editTheseSettingsMayBreakAccount: Editing these settings may damage your account.
confirmToUnclipAlreadyClippedNote: This post is already part of the "{name}" clip. Do you want to remove it from this clip instead?
i18nInfo: Campra is being translated into various languages by volunteers. You can help at {link}.
noCrawleDescription: Ask search engines to not index your profile page, posts, Pages, etc.
lockedAccountInfo: Unless you set your post visiblity to "Followers only", your posts will be visible to anyone, even if you require followers to be manually approved.
loadRawImages: Load original images instead of showing thumbnails
verificationEmailSent: A verification email has been sent. Please follow the included link to complete verification.
makeExplorableDescription: If you turn this off, your account will not show up in the "Explore" section.
showGapBetweenNotesInTimeline: Show a gap between posts on the timeline
reloadToApplySetting: This setting will only apply after a page reload. Reload now?
needReloadToApply: A reload is required for this to be reflected.
sendErrorReportsDescription:
When turned on, detailed error information will be shared with Campra when a problem occurs, helping to improve the quality of Campra.
This will include information such the version of your OS, what browser you're using, your activity in Campra, etc.
youAreRunningUpToDateClient: You are using the newest version of your client.
newVersionOfClientAvailable: There is a newer version of your client available.
userPagePinTip: You can display posts here by selecting "Pin to profile" from the menu of individual posts.
notSpecifiedMentionWarning: This post contains mentions of users not included as recipients
hideOnlineStatusDescription: Hiding your online status reduces the convenience of some features such as the search.
secureModeInfo: When requesting from other instances, do not send back without proof.
privateModeInfo: When enabled, only whitelisted instances can federate with your instances. All posts will be hidden from the public.
allowedInstancesDescription: Hosts of instances to be whitelisted for federation, each seperated by a new line (only applies in private mode).
customCssWarn: This setting should only be used if you know what it does. Entering improper values may cause the client to stop functioning normally.
useBlurEffect: Use blur effects in the UI
accountDeletionInProgress: Account deletion is currently in progress
usernameInfo: A name that identifies your account from others on Campra. You can use the alphabet (a~z, A~Z), digits (0~9) or underscores (_). Usernames cannot be changed later.
makeReactionsPublicDescription: This will make the list of all your past reactions publicly visible.
ffVisibilityDescription: Allows you to configure who can see who you follow and who follows you.
deleteAccountConfirm: This will irreversibly delete your account. Proceed?
leaveGroupConfirm: Are you sure you want to leave "{name}"?
useDrawerReactionPickerForMobile: Display reaction picker as drawer on mobile
clickToFinishEmailVerification: Please click [{ok}] to complete email verification.
instanceDefaultThemeDescription: Enter the theme code in object format.
reflectMayTakeTime: It may take some time for this to be reflected.
cropImageAsk: Do you want to crop this image?
driveCapOverrideLabel: Change the drive capacity for this user
driveCapOverrideCaption: Reset the capacity to default by inputting a value of 0 or lower.
requireAdminForView: You must log in with an administrator account to view this.
isSystemAccount: An account created and automatically operated by the system.
numberOfPageCacheDescription: Increasing this number will improve convenience for users but cause more server load as well as more memory to be used.
label: Label
cannotUploadBecauseInappropriate: This file could not be uploaded because parts of it have been detected as potentially NSFW.
cannotUploadBecauseNoFreeSpace: Upload failed due to lack of Drive capacity.
enableAutoSensitiveDescription: Allows automatic detection and marking of NSFW media through Machine Learning where possible. Even if this option is disabled, it may be enabled Campra-wide.
activeEmailValidationDescription: Enables stricter validation of email addresses, which includes checking for disposable addresses and by whether it can actually be communicated with. When unchecked, only the format of the email is validated.
enterSendsMessage: Press Return in Messaging to send message (off is Ctrl + Return)
adminCustomCssWarn: This setting should only be used if you know what it does. Entering improper values may cause EVERYONE'S clients to stop functioning normally. Please ensure your CSS works properly by testing it in your user settings.
customMOTDDescription: Custom messages for the MOTD (splash screen) separated by line breaks to be shown randomly every time a user loads/reloads the page.
customSplashIconsDescription: URLs for custom splash screen icons separated by line breaks to be shown randomly every time a user loads/reloads the page. Please make sure the images are on a static URL, preferably all resized to 192x192.
showUpdates: Show a popup when Campra updates
recommendedInstancesDescription: Recommended instances seperated by line breaks to appear in the recommended timeline. Do NOT add `https://`, ONLY the domain.
caption: Auto Caption
updateAvailable: There might be an update available!
showAdminUpdates: Indicate a new Campra version is avaliable (admin only)
staffConfirm: Are you sure that you want to mark this account as staff?
unstaffConfirm: Are you sure that you want to remove this account as staff?
plusConfirm: Are you sure that you want to give plus to this account?
unsplusConfirm: Are you sure that you want to remove plus from this account?
translatorConfirm: Are you sure that you want to mark this account as a translator?
untranslatorConfirm: Are you sure that you want to remove this account as a translator?
verifyConfirm: Are you sure that you want to verify this account?
unverifyConfirm: Are you sure that you want to un-verify this account?
subject: Subject
postsDescription: Posts is what we call posts here on Campra. They can be up to 3000 charecters and can be used to express yourself or post it out!
channelsDescription: Channels are user created/managed communities for specific topics, fandoms, and more! This allows you to connect with like minded people!
customDescription: Campra allows you to customize nearly every apsect of your experiance. With custom themes, CSS, and hats you can make Campra yours.

_sensitiveMediaDetection.description: Reduces the effort of Campra moderation through automatically recognizing NSFW media via Machine Learning. This will slightly increase the load on the server.
_sensitiveMediaDetection.sensitivityDescription: Reducing the sensitivity will lead to fewer misdetections (false positives) whereas increasing it will lead to fewer missed detections (false negatives).
_sensitiveMediaDetection.setSensitiveFlagAutomaticallyDescription: The results of the internal detection will be retained even if this option is turned off.
_sensitiveMediaDetection.analyzeVideosDescription: Analyzes videos in addition to images. This will slightly increase the load on the server.

_emailUnavailable.format: The format of this email address is invalid
_emailUnavailable.disposable: Disposable email addresses may not be used
_emailUnavailable.smtp: This email server is not responding

_signup.emailAddressInfo: Please enter your email address. It will not be made public.

_accountDelete.mayTakeTime: As account deletion is a resource-heavy process, it may take some time to complete depending on how much content you have created and how many files you have uploaded.
_accountDelete.sendEmail: Once account deletion has been completed, an email will be sent to the email address registered to this account.

_forgotPassword.enterEmail: Enter the email address you used to register. A link with which you can reset your password will then be sent to it.
_forgotPassword.ifNoEmail: If you did not use an email during registration, please contact Campra support instead.
_forgotPassword.contactAdmin: Campra does not support using email addresses, please contact Campra support to reset your password instead.

_plugin.installWarn: Please do not install untrustworthy plugins.

_preferencesBackups.inputName: Please enter a name for this backup
_preferencesBackups.nameAlreadyExists: A backup called "{name}" already exists. Please enter a different name.
_preferencesBackups.applyConfirm: Do you really want to apply the "{name}" backup to this device? Existing settings of this device will be overwritten.
_preferencesBackups.noBackups: No backups exist. You may backup your client settings on this server by using "Create new backup".

_mfm.intro: MFM is a markup language used on Campra, Calckey, Akkoma, and more that can be used in many places. Here you can view a list of all available MFM syntax.
_mfm.mentionDescription: You can specify a user by using an At-Symbol and a username.
_mfm.hashtagDescription: You can specify a hashtag using a number sign and text.
_mfm.linkDescription: Specific parts of text can be displayed as a URL.
_mfm.boldDescription: Highlights letters by making them thicker.
_mfm.inlineCodeDescription: Displays inline syntax highlighting for (program) code.
_mfm.blockCodeDescription: Displays syntax highlighting for multi-line (program) code in a block.
_mfm.blockMathDescription: Display multi-line math formulas (KaTeX) in a block
_mfm.emojiDescription: By surrounding a custom emoji name with colons, custom emoji can be displayed.
_mfm.searchDescription: Displays a search box with pre-entered text.
_mfm.twitchDescription: Gives content a strongly twitching animation.
_mfm.x4Description: Displays content even bigger than bigger than big.
_mfm.blurDescription: Blurs content. It will be displayed clearly when hovered over.
_mfm.fontDescription: Sets the font to display content in.
_mfm.rainbowDescription: Makes the content appear in rainbow colors.
_mfm.sparkleDescription: Gives content a sparkling particle effect.
_mfm.rotateDescription: Turns content by a specified angle.
_mfm.plainDescription: Deactivates the effects of all MFM contained within this MFM effect.

_wordMute.muteWordsDescription: Separate with spaces for an AND condition or with line breaks for an OR condition.
_wordMute.muteWordsDescription2: Surround keywords with slashes to use regular expressions.
_wordMute.softDescription: Hide posts that fulfil the set conditions from the timeline.
_wordMute.hardDescription: Prevents posts fulfilling the set conditions from being added to the timeline. In addition, these notes will not be added to the timeline even if the conditions are changed.

_instanceMute.instanceMuteDescription: This will mute any posts/echos from the listed instances, including those of users replying to a user from a muted instance.
_instanceMute.title: Hides posts from listed instances.
_instanceMute.heading: List of instances to be muted

_theme.invalid: The format of this theme is invalid
_theme.inputConstantName: Enter a name for this constant
_theme.importInfo: If you enter theme code here, you can import it to the theme editor
_theme.deleteConstantConfirm: Do you really want to delete the constant {const}?

_tutorial.title: How to use Campra
_tutorial.step1_2: Let's get you set up. You'll be up and running in no time!
_tutorial.step2_1: First, please fill out your profile.
_tutorial.step2_2: Providing some information about who you are will make it easier for others to tell if they want to see your posts or follow you.
_tutorial.step3_1: Now time to follow some people!
_tutorial.step3_2:
Your home and social timelines are based off of who you follow, so try following a couple accounts to get started.
Click the plus circle on the top right of a profile to follow them.
_tutorial.step4_2: For your first post, some people like to made a {introduction} post or a simple "Hello world!"
_tutorial.step5_3: The Home {icon} timeline is where you can see posts from your followers.
_tutorial.step5_4: The Local {icon} timeline is where you can see posts from everyone
_tutorial.step5_5: The Recommended {icon} timeline is where you can see posts Campra thinks you might like!
_tutorial.step5_6: The Social {icon} timeline is where you can see posts from friends of your followers.
_tutorial.step5_7: The Global {icon} timeline is where you can see posts from everyone
_tutorial.step6_2: Well, you didn't just join Campra. You joined a community full of a bit of everything.
_tutorial.step6_3: Each person works in different ways, and not all people like the same things. Don't worry though! Sometimes it can take time to get used to new places
_tutorial.step6_4: Now go, explore, and have fun!

_2fa.alreadyRegistered: You have already registered a 2-factor authentication device.
_2fa.step1: First, install an authentication app (such as {a} or {b}) on your device.
_2fa.step2: Then, scan the QR code displayed on this screen.
_2fa.step2Url: You can also enter this URL if you're using a desktop program:
_2fa.step3: Enter the token provided by your app to finish setup.
_2fa.step4: From now on, any future login attempts will ask for such a login token.
_2fa.securityKeyInfo: Besides fingerprint or PIN authentication, you can also setup authentication via hardware security keys that support FIDO2 to further secure your account.

_profile.youCanIncludeHashtags: You can also include hashtags in your bio.

_profile.cssDoc: You can use CSS to customize your profile. Please note that this is not a full-fledged CSS editor, so you may not be able to use some CSS features.

_plus.uploads5GBDescription: Enjoy larger 5GB uploads, allowing you to upload longer videos and higher quality photos (Default 1GB)

_plus.profileCSSDescription: Make your profile page truly yours by customizing the CSS of your profile
_plus.campraPlusBadgeDescription: Make your support known with the fancy Campra+ badge
